data.title: 205 Movie Trivia Questions & Answers For Game Night
data.meta_description: Guess them all correctly to prove you are a *Real Genius*.
data.text:
There's no such thing as the "best" kind of movie. Maybe you love comedies, perhaps you love romantic dramas, or possibly you like the thrill of a horror movie. And those are all correct choices! But movie trivia is NOT a matter of opinion.

How much can you really love movies if you can't answer a few trivia questions about them*? This is the chance to prove your movie buff status.

We've put together this very long list of movie trivia questions covering many genres and decades. We listed the answers right underneath the question so you can take turns answering questions in a group or read through it to update your memory bank.

You can also play as a quiz on your own if you cover the answers as you scroll down the list.

See which of your friends is the biggest cinephile!

Planning another game night? Check out our Harry Potter, Disney, Friends, Marvel and Star Wars trivia — or, if your friends are music lovers, test their knowledge with our music trivia questions.

1. What film was released in 2021 and was directed by Denis Villeneuve?

2. Who directed the 2023 film Poor Things?

Yorgos Lanthimos

3. What film is a biopic of the Von Erich family released in 2023?

The Iron Claw

4. Who won the Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in the film There Will Be Blood?

Daniel Day-Lewis

5. What year was the movie Gone With The Wind released?

6. What A24 film was released in 2022 and won Best Picture at the Academy Awards?

Everything Everywhere All At Once

7. What is the name of the serial killer in the film The Silence of The Lambs?

Buffalo Bill

8. Who is the lead actress in the film Killers of The Flower Moon?

Lily Gladstone

9. In the movie The Matrix, what is Neo's real name?

Thomas Anderson

10. What 2006 fantasy film directed by Guillermo del Toro features a faun as a central character?

11. Which classic film ends with the line, "Louis, I think this is the beginning of a beautiful friendship"?

Casablanca

12. Who directed the 2017 film Get Out?

Jordan Peele

13. What is the name of the fictional African country in the movie Black Panther?

Wakanda

14. In the film Blade Runner, what is the name of the company that created the replicants?

Tyrell Corporation

15. What 1990 movie starred Patrick Swayze and Whoopi Goldberg?

16. What do Katniss and Peeta attempt to poison themselves with in The Hunger Games?

Nightlock.

17. Which actor played Tommy Wiseau in The Disaster Artist?

James Franco

18. What are the names of the two main characters in La La Land?

Mia and Sebastian

19. Who directed the 1994 film Pulp Fiction?

Quentin Tarantino

20. Who voiced Mushu in Mulan?

21. What film won the Best Picture Oscar in 2020?

Parasite

22. What is the name of the woman who falls into Korben Dallas' car in The Fifth Element?

Leeloo

23. What gift does Rose find in her coat pocket at the end of Titanic?

A necklace.

24. What famous star produced Barbie?

Margot Robbie

25. What score does Elle get on her LSAT exam in Legally Blonde?

26. Who is the director of Oppenheimer?

Christopher Nolan

27. What is the name of the 1992 movie starring Tom Hanks and Geena Davis?

A League of Their Own

28. What breakfast food does Donkey want to make with Shrek in Shrek?

Waffles

29. Which one of Voldemort's Horcruxes was destroyed last in Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows — Part 2?

Nagini the snake

30. In Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory, who is the first kid the Oompa Loompas sing about?

31. What color did Frenchy dye her hair in Grease?

Pink

32. Who voiced Coraline in Coraline?

Dakota Fanning

33. Where do Kat and Patrick first kiss in 10 Things I Hate About You?

A paintball arena

34. Who voiced Jessie in Toy Story 2?

Joan Cusack

35. In Breakfast At Tiffany's, what is the name of Holly Golightly's cat?

36. Black Panther made history as the first superhero film nominated for what award?

Best Picture Oscar

37. What film was Kate Winslet's first movie?

Heavenly Creatures

38. In The Lion King, Mufasa dies from being trampled by a pack of:

Wildebeests

39. Adjusted for inflation, which movie has made more money in the domestic box office: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope, E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial, The Sound of Music, or Gone with the Wind?

Gone with the Wind

40. Jordan Belfort works for which firm in The Wolf of Wall Street?

41. What iconic line does Miranda Priestly say when dismissing Andy in The Devil Wears Prada?

“That's all.”

42. What film was Keanu Reeves' movie debut?

Youngblood

43. Who does Patrick Swayze pick up in an iconic lift in Dirty Dancing?

Jennifer Grey

44. In Inception, how many dream levels does the crew enter?

Five

45. Which song does Jenna Rink perform to in 13 Going On 30?

46. What is the movie in which Jim Carrey discovers that his everyday life is really a TV show about him?

The Truman Show

47. What was Emma Stone's character named in Crazy, Stupid Love?

Hannah

48. Where does Sex and the City 2 take place?

Abu Dhabi

49. Who plays Bob Woodward in All the President's Men?

Robert Redford

50. What are the five student stereotypes in Breakfast Club?

51. Which literary icon reviews Gil Pender's manuscript in Midnight in Paris?

Gertrude Stein

52. What was the first James Bond movie ever made?

Dr. No

53. Where do Noah Calhoun and Allie Hamilton meet in The Notebook?

A carnival

54. 'The Matrix' code in The Matrix came from recipes for which kind of food?

Sushi

55. What's the last word in this famous Toy Story quote: "To infinity and ____!"

56. What is the name of the fictional kingdom where Frozen takes place?

Arendelle

57. What was the name of the movie created in Bowfinger?

"Chubby Rain"

58. When did Four Weddings and a Funeral premiere?

1994

59. Which animal is killed in Fatal Attraction?

A bunny

60. Which holiday do Meg Ryan and Billy Crystal celebrate at the end of When Harry Met Sally?

61. Which of the following is NOT true about Star Wars: A New Hope: almost every studio passed on making it, George Lucas gave up an extra directing fee in exchange for the merchandising and sequel rights, or the film won the Best Picture Oscar at the 1978 Academy Awards?

NOT TRUE: The film won the Best Picture Oscar at the 1978 Academy Awards

62. True or false: Janet Jackson turned down the role of Lisa McDowell in The Nightmare Before Christmas?

False

63. What was Scream originally called?

It was originally called Scary Movie.

64. Which of these facts is true about The Departed: Martin Scorsese had been wanting to make it since the early '90s; it is a remake of a Hong Kong film; or Robert Redford was everyone's first choice to play Frank Costello?

TRUE: It is a remake of a Hong Kong film.

65. In The Matrix, what color are the two pills that Morpheus gives Neo to choose between?

66. Which horror movie is this quote from: "Sometimes, dead is better"?

Pet Sematary

67. What was the name of the fashion line named after Derek Zoolander in Zoolander?

"Derelicte"

68. What's the last word of this famous Mean Girls quote: "You don't even go ____!"

"Here"

69. Where do Ferris and his friends NOT go to in Ferris Bueller's Day Off: the top of the Sears Tower, a Chicago Bears game, or the Art Institute of Chicago?

They don't go to a Chicago Bears game.

70. Which famous British comedian voiced Zazu in The Lion King (1994)?

71. Where does Hugh Grant's character work in Notting Hill?

A travel bookshop

72. True or false: Amy Heckerling — who wrote and directed Clueless — originally pitched the movie as a TV series for Fox.

True

73. What's the last word in this famous quote: "I'm going to make him an offer he can't ________."?

Refuse

74. In Avengers: Infinity War, what planet does Thor travel to to create Stormbreaker?

Nidavellir

75. Which movie is this the poster for?

76. Who is the youngest Oscar winner of all time?

Tatum O'Neal

77. Who directed Us?

Jordan Peele

78. How many Pixar animated films have been released?

27

79. Who directed Kill Bill?

Quentin Tarantino

80. What did Regina George's shirt say in this scene?

81. What language is the movie Pan's Labyrinth in?

Spanish

82. Which Final Destination movie has a number of deaths that take place on a roller coaster?

Final Destination 3

83. What did Zach Galifianakis call the baby in The Hangover?

Carlos

84. What year did Bring It On come out?

2000

85. Who played Elliot Page's love interest in the movie Juno?

86. Which child from Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory found the first Golden Ticket?

Augustus Gloop

87. What was in the box in Se7en?

Mills's (Brad Pitt) wife's head

88. Which of these movies did Meryl Streep NOT win an Oscar for: Kramer vs. Kramer, Doubt, The Iron Lady, or Sophie's Choice?

She didn't win an Oscar for Doubt.

89. Which actor — in one of their first roles — played a young Wendy Darling in Hook?

Gwyneth Paltrow

90. Who does Oprah Winfrey play in A Wrinkle in Time?

91. Which actor did Steven Spielberg originally want for the role of Dr. Alan Grant in Jurassic Park?

Harrison Ford

92. What was the first movie to feature a toilet flushing?

Psycho

93. What was the first animated movie to be nominated for Best Picture at the Oscars?

Beauty and the Beast

94. Which celebrity's face is the Michael Myers mask in Halloween a replica of?

William Shatner

95. Which of these is not one of the Seven Dwarfs: Bashful, Angry, Dopey, Doc?

96. What kind of pet did Norma Desmond have in Sunset Boulevard?

A chimpanzee

97. Which of these nominated musicals won the Oscar for Best Picture: The Wizard of Oz, La La Land, Cabaret, or West Side Story (1961)?

West Side Story

98. Which actor was originally cast as Juliet opposite Leonardo DiCaprio in Romeo + Juliet: Kate Winslet, Liv Tyler, or Natalie Portman?

Natalie Portman

99. Who starred as Arnold Schwarzenegger's twin in the 1988 movie Twins?

Danny DeVito

100. In Ferris Bueller's Day Off, who does Ferris claim to be at the door of the restaurant?

101. In Citizen Kane, what was "Rosebud" a reference to?

His childhood sled

102. What live animal came out of Tony Todd's mouth in the infamous Candyman scene?

Bees

103. The character Ellen Ripley is from which movie or series?

Alien

104. What movie is this Sidney Poitier quote from? "They call me Mister Tibbs!"

In the Heat of the Night

105. What makes the Parks come home early from vacation in the movie Parasite?

106. What comes out of Paddy's mouth when he dies in The Blue Lagoon?

A crab

107. What's the last word in this famous Jaws quote: "You're gonna need a bigger _____."

Boat

108. What brand of underwear does Marty wear in Back to the Future?

Calvin Klein

109. What's the name of the magazine Jenna edits in 13 Going On 30?

Poise

110. In Bambi, what is the name of Bambi's skunk friend?

111. Which actor was cast as Marty McFly in Back to the Future before he was let go and replaced by Michael J. Fox: Rob Lowe, Emilio Estevez, or Eric Stoltz?

Eric Stoltz

112. In Coming to America, what does Semmi install in the cheap apartment that he and Prince Akeem rent?

A Jacuzzi

113. Which of these Disney movies was released first: Pocahontas, Mulan, The Lion King, or Toy Story?

The Lion King

114. In Clueless, how does Cher choose her outfits?

With a computer program

115. Which movie is this screencap from?

116. In The Naked Gun, what two valuable items does Lieutenant Drebin manage to destroy at once?

A fish and a pen

117. Which designer made a cameo in The Devil Wears Prada: Valentino, Ralph Lauren, or Calvin Klein?

Valentino

118. In Avengers: Infinity War, what does Thanos say to Thor after he stabs him in the chest with Stormbreaker?

"You should have gone for the head."

119. Why does Elle's deceitful boyfriend break up with her at the beginning of Legally Blonde?

He wants to be a politician.

120. Phil, Stu, and Alan spend all of The Hangover looking for their friend Doug. Where do they eventually find him?

121. What's the last word in this Gone With the Wind quote: "Frankly, my dear, I don't give a _______."

Damn

122. What was Brad Pitt's first movie?

The Dark Side of the Sun

123. Including the 2018 film, how many versions of A Star Is Born are there?

Four

124. In Look Who's Talking, what does John Travolta's character do for a living?

He's a taxi driver.

125. What was Meg Ryan's username in You've Got Mail?

126. In Elvira, Mistress of the Dark, what does Elvira drive into the head of the villain who attacks her in the cemetery?

Her stiletto heel

127. Who played Bruce Wayne in The Batman (2022)?

Robert Pattinson

128. What's the name of Chris Pratt's character in Jurassic World?

Owen Grady

129. In what year did Keanu Reeves make his movie debut?

1986

130. Where does The Help take place?

131. In Easy A, what’s the name of Olive’s high school?

Ojai North High School

132. Who played Adam Reed in The Adam Project?

Ryan Reynolds

133. What does Charlie use to write a letter to a friend in the opening scene of The Perks of Being a Wallflower?

A pencil and paper

134. In Mean Girls, what's the name of the restaurant to which Cady receives gift certificates when she wins Spring Fling Queen?

Walker Brothers Pancake House

135. Finish this quote from Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring: "One does not simply walk into ____."

136. What was Chadwick Boseman's first movie?

The Express

137. In Shrek, what does Shrek compare ogres to?

Onions

138. In Mean Girls, what does Gretchen claim her father invented?

Toaster Strudels

139. Who plays Jackson Briggs in Dog?

Channing Tatum

140. In Rear Window (1954), what is Jeff Jefferies recovering from when he thinks he witnesses a murder across the courtyard?

141. Which actor played adult Simba in the 2019 version of The Lion King?

Donald Glover

142. What novel does Rusty give to his girlfriend Kate in Stuck in Love?

It by Stephen King

143. Who plays Madea in Madea Homecoming?

Tyler Perry

144. In Ice Age, which character is a saber-toothed tiger?

Diego

145. Which song does Joanna sing at the holiday concert in Love Actually?

146. What was the name of Reese Witherspoon's first movie?

The Man in the Moon

147. In Frozen, is Kristoff raised by mountain lions, villagers, or trolls?

Trolls

148. According to Forrest's mom, what is life like in Forrest Gump?

A box of chocolates

149. Which mixed martial arts legend appeared in Furious 7?

Ronda Rousey

150. What is Edward's last name in Twilight?

151. Who plays Zoey Baker in Cheaper by the Dozen (2022)?

Gabrielle Union

152. In The Hunger Games, who does Katniss volunteer to replace after their name is drawn from the reaping bowl?

Primrose

153. Which of these characters is NOT in 2012's The Avengers: Hulk, Thor, Spider-Man, or Hawkeye?

Spider-Man

154. In Titanic, what is the name of Rose's necklace?

The Heart of the Ocean

155. In Slumdog Millionaire, what is the grand prize question Jamal is asked?

156. In The Wedding Planner, Mary's heel gets stuck in a manhole cover when what starts racing toward her?

A runaway dumpster

157. Who plays Jodi Kreyman in Tall Girl?

Ava Michelle

158. What is the name of the Princess who Lord Farquaad wants to marry in Shrek?

Fiona

159. In Toy Story, which of these is not one of Buzz Lightyear's features: a space helmet, lasers, wings, or a grappling hook?

A grappling hook

160. Finish the lyric to Frozen II's hit song "Into the Unknown": "Everyone I've ever loved is here within these walls, _________________________."

161. In which decade did Halle Berry make her movie debut?

The 1990s

162. What is the name of the superweapon that Lord Business steals in The Lego Movie?

The Kragle

163. In Paddington, where does Montgomery Clyde find Paddington's aunt and uncle?

Peru

164. In the movie Babe, what is Babe's role on the farm?

Sheep herding

165. Which Las Vegas hotel is the main target of Danny Ocean and his team in Ocean's Eleven?

166. What is the name of Hiccup's village in the How to Train Your Dragon series?

Berk

167. What is Lightning McQueen's number in Cars?

95

168. After the Great Pyramid of Giza gets stolen, what does Gru plan on stealing in Despicable Me?

The moon

169. Where's the college that Aimee ends up attending in The Spectacular Now?

Philadelphia

170. According to The Princess Diaries, what fruit is Genovia famous for?

171. Who killed Manny's family in Ice Age?

Humans

172. According to Diary of a Wimpy Kid, what automatically makes you an outcast?

The Cheese Touch

173. In which decade did Kate Winslet make her movie debut?

The 1990s

174. In the To All the Boys I’ve Loved Before movie, where does Lara Jean and Peter’s first ~high school~ kiss take place?

On the school running track

175. What does Mia mistakenly snort and overdose on in Pulp Fiction?

176. What’s the name of Hazel’s favorite author in The Fault in Our Stars?

Peter Van Houten

177. In The Kissing Booth, what's the theme of the senior prom?

Memories

178. In Avengers: Endgame, who are the first heroes to come out of a portal to help during the final battle with Thanos?

Black Panther, Okoye, and Shuri

179. In Aladdin, what does Aladdin gets chased through the town for stealing?

A loaf of bread

180. In The Truman Show, why is Truman afraid of water?

181. In Avatar, what's the name of the alien world that humans are visiting in their "avatar" form?

Pandora

182. In Titanic, as Rose begins to share her Titanic experience, how long does she say has passed?

84 years

183. Which of these is not one of Billy Batson's Shazam powers: super strength, invisibility, or flight?

Invisibility

184. What are the first words spoken in Star Wars: The Force Awakens?

"This will begin to make things right."

185. In Crazy Rich Asians, what country do Rachel and Nick travel to to attend a wedding?

186. What is Andy Dufresne's first assignment when he gets to prison in The Shawshank Redemption?

Prison laundry

187. In Spider-Man: Homecoming, Peter Parker's main nemesis goes by what name?

Vulture

188. The original Blade Runner movie takes place in what year?

2019

189. What is the name of Roger Rabbit's wife in Who Framed Roger Rabbit?

Jessica

190. In Dead Poets Society, what does John Keating teach?

191. Which house wins the Quidditch game in Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone?

Gryffindor

192. In Men in Black, Will Smith's character is known as Agent...

J

193. In Raiders of the Lost Ark, what is the name of Indiana Jones's rival who also hunts for the Ark of the Covenant?

René Belloq

195. In Get Out, what is Chris Washington's job?

196. What do the kids nickname Mr. Mertle's dog in The Sandlot?

The Beast

197. How many exes does Scott Pilgrim fight in Scott Pilgrim vs. the World?

Seven

198. What team does Pat's dad bet on in Silver Linings Playbook?

The Philadelphia Eagles

199. Where is Kevin McAllister's family when they realize they forgot Kevin in Home Alone?

Paris

200. In The Terminator, which character is the Terminator sent to kill?

201. What is the name of Vito's youngest son in The Godfather?

Michael

202. What is the name of the main antagonist in Saw?

Jigsaw

203. What is the name of Humphrey Bogart's character in The African Queen?

Charlie Allnut

204. In Girls Trip, why does the group of friends travel to New Orleans?

To attend Essence Fest.

205. Who is the first person to die in A Nightmare on Elm Street?

Tina Gray

Share This Article
